main event: An oval object, approximately 20-25 feet long with flashing lights, was observed in Lamone, Missouri on September 19, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., The object exhibited up and down movement., Estimated dimensions of the object were 20-25 feet long and 15 feet wide., Bright full moon conditions during the sighting., The conclusion suggested it was probably a balloon or possibly astronomical due to insufficient data.
witness description: An airman who was vague on many details concerning the sighting.
